messages.title: JOIN THE THOUSANDS OF PEOPLE, JUST LIKE YOU, VOTING FOR CHANGE IN NORTH DURHAM.
messages.content: I was born, brought up and went to school locally. I'm proud of our area and think we have been taken for granted. I will be a strong voice for the North East and North Durham.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Always putting the North East and North Durham first
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Will not just toe the party line.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Taking action to create jobs and tackle unemployment
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Taking action to create jobs and tackle unemployment.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Having zero tolerance on anti social behaviour
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Having zero tolerance on anti social behaviour.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Protecting our NHS and defending local GPs' surgeries
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Protecting our NHS and defending local GPs' surgeries.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: A high quality education for all
keyPolicies.policyDescription: A high quality education for all.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: A fair deal for pensioners - relinking pensions to earnings
keyPolicies.policyDescription: A fair deal for pensioners - relinking pensions to earnings.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Controlling immigration with a strict annual limit
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Controlling immigration with a strict annual limit.

leaflet.personalStatement: Vote for me if you want a hard working local man as your MP, who will be a young, dynamic and passionate voice for our area. Lend me your vote for four years and I will work tirelessly for you. Please keep this card so you can hold me to my promises in 4 years time.

images.caption: Photo of the campaign leaflet highlighting key priorities and personal statement.
